summary:
Burkina Faso is a country in West Africa with a rich history. It was once called Upper Volta but was renamed by leader Thomas Sankara. The country has faced many challenges, including coups and instability. Sankara made big changes, like improving education and helping farmers. However, he was later overthrown.

Burkina Faso has a diverse population with many ethnic groups. Islam is the main religion, but Christianity is also practiced. The country is known for its art and has many natural resources like gold. It is a member of various international groups but recently left some regional organizations.
title: Burkina Faso
